code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{ARTICLES}from'../../app/data';export var projectsSlice=createSlice({name:'articles',initialState:{articles:ARTICLES},reducers:{}});export var selectArticles=function selectArticles(state){return state.articles.articles;};export var filterArticles=function filterArticles(query,articles){return Object.values(articles).filter(function(article){return article.title.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase());});};export default projectsSlice.reducer;
